title: A new delightful ballad called, Debauchery scared; or, The beggar wench turn'd into a devil, together with the pollicy of bumpkin; giving a peasant account of commical passages between a country gentleman, and a London beggar-wench. Tune of, Ladies of London. This may be printed, R.P.
publisher: Printed for J. Bissel at the Bible and Harp near the hospital-gate in West-smithfield.,
